comment: Butler (CHI) makes contact with Thomas' (BOS) body that affects his jump shot attempt.
After communicating with the Replay Center, the ruling on the floor of a 2pt field goal is confirmed.
Thomas (BOS) makes body to body contact with Grant (CHI) that affects his SQBR.
Horford (BOS) sets the screen on Butler (CHI) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Grant (CHI) makes contact with the ball and Thomas' (BOS) hand as part of the ball.
Gibson (CHI) makes contact with Thomas' (BOS) body that affects his driving shot attempt.
Thomas (BOS) makes contact with McDermott (CHI) that affects his FOM.
Butler (CHI) maintains legal guarding position on Thomas' (BOS) drive to the basket and shot attempt.
Gibson (CHI) sets the screen on Smart (BOS) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Gibson (CHI) sets the screen on Smart (BOS) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Smart (BOS) maintains legal guarding position on Butler's (CHI) drive and makes contact with the ball.
Gibson (CHI) makes incidental contact with Smart (BOS) going for the loose ball.
Butler (CHI) makes marginal contact with Young (BOS) that does not affect his SQBR.
[Detectable with stop watch] Horford (BOS) is in the paint for longer than three seconds.
Butler (CHI) legally contests Thomas' (BOS) shot attempt.
After communicating with the Replay Center, the ruling on the floor of basket interference is overturned.
Smart (BOS) makes contact with Butler’s (CHI) arm that affects his jump shot attempt. Any contact to a shooter’s hand, arm, or wrist prior to the release of the shot is considered a foul.
After communicating with the Replay Center, it is determined that Smart (BOS) committed the foul prior to the game clock expiring. The game clock is reset to 00:00.9.
Thomas (BOS) sets the screen on Lopez (CHI) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Butler (CHI) makes contact with the ball on Horford's (BOS) shot attempt.
